summary: Traducción al castellano del mod original \"Categorized Favorites Menu\" del modder favmenumodder.
descriptionHtml:
Actualizado 03/01/2012 - 11:50

Se trata de la traducción al castellano del mod original [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] del modder [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3562925]favmenumodder[/url].

Créditos:
Mod original - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3562925]favmenumodder[/url]
Traducción - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3510751]Silinde87[/url]


**************************************************************************************************************************************
Instalación
1- Descomprime los dos archivos: favoritesmenu.cfg y favoritesmenu.swf
2- Colocalos en la carpeta: \"X:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyirim\\Data\\Interface\"


**************************************************************************************************************************************
Log de cambios:

v0.4 (06/01/2012):
-Asignado grito \"susurro del aura\" a su categoría correspondiente.
-Añadidos todos los poderes raciales en su categoría correspondiente.

v0.3 (03/01/2012): 
-Compatibilizada la traducción con la versión 0.1.6 original, que incluye:

- Añadidas las sublistas. Cada lista puede tener una serie de sublistas, las cuales
organizan los items por categorias. Por ejemplo, las sublistas de pociones son Magia, Salud y Resistencia
Mira el archivo de configuración para conocer como configurarlas.
- Arreglado el problema por el cual las listas no seleccionaban la fuente correctamente.
Los títulos deberían escoger la variable \"$EverywhereMediumFont\".
Opción de configuración \"title_font_name\" está ahora desactivada
- Los colores de los Favoritos son ahora configurables con \"hotkey_color\" en el archivo de configuración
- El color de los divisores de sublista y cabecera de sección son ahora configurables con 
\"divider_color\" en el archivo de configuración


v0.2 (02/01/2012): 
-Añadidos todos los hechizos y arreglados fallos de compatibilidad de armas.


**************************************************************************************************************************************


Descripción Original
================================================
Categorized Favorites Menu v0.1.6 (Jan 2, 2012)
================================================

This mod replaces the single favorites menu with several categorized
favorites menus. Use the mouse and mouse wheel, or WASD or the arrow
keys to navigate. Menus can be configured in favoritesmenu.cfg.

Recommended minimum resolution is 1024x768.

Compatible with:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863]SkyUI[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=667]QD Inventory[/url]
Xbox controller on PC: Some people have reported that it works fine, others that it doesn\'t.
Try using left/right on the left stick to go between lists.


For customized configuration files that you might want to share,
I recommend posting the file to skyrim nexus as a new file. Add 
your link to the files at the \"Custom Configurations\" discussion topic
http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?showtopic=512392
If it\'s popular, I can link to the config here, or include them in
the distribution.

================================================
Installation
================================================

Copy favoritesmenu.swf and favoritesmenu.cfg to the
\"<game directory>\\Data\\Interface\" folder. For Steam, this is typically
\"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Interface\"


================================================
Uninstallation
================================================

Delete favoritesmenu.swf and favoritesmenu.cfg from the game folder.


================================================
Compatibility
================================================

This mod was developed and tested with Skyrim version 1.3.10.0 from
Steam. This mod has not been tested with the Xbox, PlayStation, or
non-Steam PC versions of Skyrim.

This mod should work with the xbox controller on PC, though I haven\'t
personally tested it. Should also be compatible with SkyUI and
QD Inventory.

Unfortunately, the game doesn\'t give the favorites menu any information
about favorited items -- just its name, hotkey, and some index values.
So, the mod has to resort to keyword matching. This means that (for now)
the default configuration will not work with mods that change item/spell names,
for example, HeadBombs Better Sorting mod (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730).
It also means the default configuration will work with only the English version
of Skyrim. You can add/modify any miscategorized items, or translate item names
by editing the favoritesmenu.cfg file. Patches welcome!


================================================
Featured in
================================================
The Categorized Favorites Menu as featured in reviews, videos, etc.

Skyrim Mods Weekly #7 - Quality World Map, Coolsims Hair, Triss Armor, Categorized Favorites:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=zc0kF0mM3ko#t=280s

================================================
Translations
================================================

The following links are to translations of the config file.
These translations are the work of other modders and users.
To translate the config file, make sure you save the file using
UTF-16 encoding (the config file for v0.1.5+ is in UTF-16LE).

Italiano:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4935]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4935[/url]

Deutsch:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4941]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4941[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4948]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4948[/url]

Français:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5072]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5072[/url]

Español:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5140]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5140[/url]

================================================
Known Issues
================================================

1. List up/down animations are broken.

2. May or may not work with mods that modify fonts.


================================================
Credits
================================================

Bethesda for creating Skyrim, and skyrimnexus for creating this forum.
author: Silinde87

files.name: Categorized Favorites Menu - SPANISH v03
files.changelogHtml:
Compatibilizada la traducción con la versión 0.1.6 original
Añadidas las sublistas. Cada lista puede tener una serie de sublistas, las cuales organizan los items por categorias.
Arreglado el problema por el cual las listas no seleccionaban la fuente correctamente.
Los colores de los Favoritos son ahora configurables con \"hotkey_color\" en el archivo de configuración.
El color de los divisores de sublista y cabecera de sección son ahora configurables con \"divider_color\" en el archivo de configuración.

files.name: Categorized Favorites Menu - SPANISH v04
files.changelogHtml:
Asignado grito \"susurro del aura\" a su categoría correspondiente.
Añadidos todos los poderes raciales en su categoría correspondiente.
